overview: I developed a new tactic and strategy to help small business owners get to the top of the search engines in their local market. I have been doing this for over 17+ years and I really love doing what I do. To be successful at tactical marketing you have to be the type of person that is willing to comb through mountains of data, appreciate a well developed spreadsheet and be able to read between the lines to see what you need to do next. There’s no mystery in what I do it’s just grunt work not unlike and accountant and their spreadsheets.
